snippet: The Southeastern Conference will be tied to ESPN, which will own and operate the channel, through 2034.
abstract: Southeastern Conference will carry 45 college football games and hundreds of other events on its own television network launching August 2014, following lead of other college athletic conferences; SEC Network will be owned and operated by ESPN.
lead_paragraph: The Southeastern Conference will be tied to ESPN, which will own and operate the channel, through 2034.

headline.seo: SEC Will Have Own TV Network Starting in 2014
headline.main: SEC Will Start TV Network in 2014
headline.print_headline: SEC Will Start TV Network in 2014
